title: Neal Brennan
description:
On this episode comedian, writer, and director Neal Brennan joins Kevin Hart. They talk about his work with Dave Chappelle on Chappelle’s Show, the time ‘Half Baked’ went up against Titanic at the box office, and why he sees writing as his superpower now.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Neal Brennan, Kevin Hart)
